QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT CAST(RIGHT([Member ID], LEN([Member ID]) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS person_id, CAST(RIGHT([Claim ID], LEN([Claim ID]) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS visit_occurrence_id, 0 AS drug_concept_id, [Date of prescription] AS drug_exposure_start_date, CASE WHEN [Duration per prescription] > 180 THEN 180 ELSE [Duration per prescription] END AS days_supply, CASE WHEN [Type of claim] = 'out-patient' OR [Type of claim] = 'pharmacy' THEN 38000175 ELSE 38000180 END AS drug_type_concept_id, [Administered amount] AS quantity, CASE WHEN [Physician ID] IS NULL THEN CAST('1' + RIGHT([Institution ID], LEN([Institution ID]) - 1) AS BIGINT) ELSE CAST('2' + RIGHT([Physician ID], LEN([Physician ID]) - 1) AS BIGINT) END AS prescribing_provider_id, [Drug code] AS drug_source_value, CASE WHEN [Daily dose per prescription] IS NOT NULL THEN CAST([Daily dose per prescription] AS VARCHAR) + ' ' + [Unit of administered amount] ELSE '' END + CASE WHEN [As-needed medication flag] = 1 THEN ' as needed' ELSE '' END AS sig, [Actual point] * 10 AS total_paid FROM {sc}.[Drug] d JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND d.[Member ID] = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by CAST(RIGHT([Member ID], LEN([Member ID]) - 1) AS BIGINT)
